Articles.Content:
Hello I'm new in this forum, so if I put the video in the wrong Sub-forum, feel free to change it.

So I wanted to make a cinematic video of the Apollo missions for the 45th anniversary. I know is a littel bit late but I didn't have the time to do it on the schedule. If you have any cuestion I will anwser what I can. Also, this is my first KSP cinematic so if you see something I could rework for my next cinematic tell my, it would be appreciated. So no more talking:sealed:, and tanks for your time.
